title: The Saraithian Rising
description: Ardrus rides across his beloved lands weighed by recent deed. Known for his right action, he stands for the first time in confusion. Will he destroy all he loves, all he has sworn to protect? With his faithful knights at his side, can he save Pantium from civil war or worse?A novella length fantasy story, the prelude to the Etherium: Rise of Fire. In the world of Adrayen, the kingdom of Pantium has endured for three thousand years, since the first age, where the man Velaris forged himself into a god. Now, the Raithian order faces a threat that could destroy all.
author: Kody Kline
